My Top 8 (*battle*) songs of the soundtrack are as follows:

1: Hacking Malfunction
2: Cosmos
3: Lanius
4: Last Stand
5: Lost Ship
6: Rockmen
7: MilkyWay
8: Civil

snippet.textDisplay: I would absolutely adore a version of this song with the last third extended. Well done Ben Prunty, not many songs of this genre do so much as catch my interest - but your songs have excelled in making my ears bleed from listening to them too much.

snippet.textDisplay:
I hate how AE raped all former mods. But... I love all the mods I have SO MUCH that I don't play AE, I still play original FTL.

...Maybe by this time, the modding community has revived and made them compatible with AE? Regardless, this music is still awesome, and I wish I could experience it in-game.
snippet.textOriginal:
I hate how AE raped all former mods. But... I love all the mods I have SO MUCH that I don't play AE, I still play original FTL.

...Maybe by this time, the modding community has revived and made them compatible with AE? Regardless, this music is still awesome, and I wish I could experience it in-game.

snippet.textDisplay: If you find and join Cicada 3301, they tell you how to beat FTL without getting lucky
snippet.textOriginal: If you find and join Cicada 3301, they tell you how to beat FTL without getting lucky

snippet.textDisplay:
You can say this game is luck all you want. Still doesn't change the fact that some people are so good at this game, they have to make up extra challenges on top of the hardest difficulty to even break a sweat.
Like never pausing, only using certain weapons etc.
snippet.textOriginal:
You can say this game is luck all you want. Still doesn't change the fact that some people are so good at this game, they have to make up extra challenges on top of the hardest difficulty to even break a sweat.
Like never pausing, only using certain weapons etc.

snippet.textDisplay: Agreed. My first 30 hours of gameplay were all deaths I think. The next 40 and I had beaten the game with every ship
snippet.textOriginal: Agreed. My first 30 hours of gameplay were all deaths I think. The next 40 and I had beaten the game with every ship

snippet.textDisplay:
@William Martin
So it couldn't have *possibly* been your fault that *you* _weren't good enough_ to pull through?
snippet.textOriginal:
@William Martin
So it couldn't have *possibly* been your fault that *you* _weren't good enough_ to pull through?

snippet.textDisplay: @ZobmieRules The hell they aren't.  I've been all the way to sector 8 and get hit with some real shitty luck.  Shit will shut you right down.
snippet.textOriginal: @ZobmieRules The hell they aren't.  I've been all the way to sector 8 and get hit with some real shitty luck.  Shit will shut you right down.

snippet.textDisplay: @Metaknightkirby2 In a rogue-like, there's always going to be luck. That said, I believe that FTL's luck-based elements aren't extreme enough to force a game-over. You can have bad runs, and still salvage them.
snippet.textOriginal: @Metaknightkirby2 In a rogue-like, there's always going to be luck. That said, I believe that FTL's luck-based elements aren't extreme enough to force a game-over. You can have bad runs, and still salvage them.

snippet.textDisplay: @ZobmieRules Well, to a certain extend it's luck as well. If the RNG hates you and deals you a couple of crappy events in succession you have pretty much no option but to lose. :/
snippet.textOriginal: @ZobmieRules Well, to a certain extend it's luck as well. If the RNG hates you and deals you a couple of crappy events in succession you have pretty much no option but to lose. :/

snippet.textDisplay: I think I have done 50 runs so far.  I don't play it for a while after I have been crushed.  I also make a few dumb mistakes.
snippet.textOriginal: I think I have done 50 runs so far.  I don't play it for a while after I have been crushed.  I also make a few dumb mistakes.

snippet.textDisplay: It's normal. You're still in the training phase. How many runs have you done in total so far? It's normal for people's first ~30 runs to end in explosive death.
snippet.textOriginal: It's normal. You're still in the training phase. How many runs have you done in total so far? It's normal for people's first ~30 runs to end in explosive death.

snippet.textDisplay: Was looking forward to the new music, among other things, and expectations have been met.
snippet.textOriginal: Was looking forward to the new music, among other things, and expectations have been met.

snippet.textDisplay: Do <3 this expansion, specially the lunius theme and battle theme, nice update to the game.
snippet.textOriginal: Do <3 this expansion, specially the lunius theme and battle theme, nice update to the game.

snippet.textDisplay: Those who loved FTL are probably very happy about this edition, but all I wanted was to get more FTL music by Ben Prunty. He really helped give this game a uniquely awesome atmosphere. This is probably my favorite theme from this expansion.
snippet.textOriginal: Those who loved FTL are probably very happy about this edition, but all I wanted was to get more FTL music by Ben Prunty. He really helped give this game a uniquely awesome atmosphere. This is probably my favorite theme from this expansion.

snippet.textDisplay:
Not gonna lie, my first thought was "more Ben Prunty!" followed by "more FTL!"
Didn't know he had a bandcamp page until you posted it there. I wish I had gotten the soundtrack from there, rather than Steam, so I could've gotten it in .flac...
snippet.textOriginal:
Not gonna lie, my first thought was "more Ben Prunty!" followed by "more FTL!"
